  • Constructor Details

    • ConferenceImpl

      public ConferenceImpl(String name, LocalDateTime year, String field)
      Constructor for the Conference
      Parameters:
      name - - name of the Conference
      year - - year of the Conference
      field - - field of the Conference The conferenceState is set as on_editing, nSessions is set as 0, the sessions array is initialized with the initial size, the nParticipants is set as 0, the participants array is initialized with the initial size

    • addSession

      public boolean addSession(estg.ipp.pt.tp02_conferencesystem.interfaces.Session sn) throws estg.ipp.pt.tp02_conferencesystem.exceptions.ConferenceException
      Adds a session to the sessions array
      Specified by:
      addSession in interface estg.ipp.pt.tp02_conferencesystem.interfaces.Conference
      Parameters:
      sn - the session to add
      Returns:
      true if the session was added, false otherwise
      Throws:
      estg.ipp.pt.tp02_conferencesystem.exceptions.ConferenceException - if the session is null, if there is any problem with the redimension of the sessions array, if the conference is not in editing mode, if the room assigned to the session is already occupied, if the presenter of any session is already presenting in another session or if there's any presentation already scheduled in other session

    • removeSession

      public void removeSession(int i) throws estg.ipp.pt.tp02_conferencesystem.exceptions.ConferenceException
      Removes a session from the sessions array
      Specified by:
      removeSession in interface estg.ipp.pt.tp02_conferencesystem.interfaces.Conference
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the session to remove
      Throws:
      estg.ipp.pt.tp02_conferencesystem.exceptions.ConferenceException - if the conference is not in editing mode, if there are no sessions to remove or if the sessions doesn't exist

      public String export() throws IOException
      Exports all data to JSON files for posterior use
      Specified by:
      export in interface estg.ipp.pt.tp02_conferencesystem.io.interfaces.Exporter
      Returns:
      String (we suppose that this should be an array of strings, not just a string)
      Throws:
